description:
Yelp is an incredibly powerful search engine for businesses. Google is very critical, but based on our experience we've seen companies have a lot of success if they decide to leverage this platform. If you are serious about growing your business, Yelp For Business is something most businesses should leverage:

  • Introduction To Yelp’s Platform
  • Managing You Reputation Via Yelp & Even Other Platforms
  • Claiming Your Business profile
  • How To Get Reviews
  • How To Advertise On Yelp
  • Yelp’s Tools & Resources
  • Case Studies & Live Examples

By the end of this course, you will learn how to generate leads and sales via Yelp as well many manage your reputation on Yelp.
title: Yelp Business & Reputation Management - Promote Your Company
